Smart Hanger: A coat hanger with a built-in sensor that detects when a garment is placed on it and automatically adjusts its shape to provide maximum space efficiency in the closet. The hanger can also track the temperature and humidity levels in the closet and provide recommendations on how to optimize storage for different types of garments.

Hanger with Built-In Steamer: A coat hanger with a built-in steamer function that allows users to quickly and easily remove wrinkles from their garments without having to use a separate steamer. The hanger can be powered by a battery or plugged into a wall outlet.

Hanger with Light: A coat hanger with a built-in LED light that illuminates the back of the hanger, making it easier to see the garments hanging on it, especially in dimly lit closets. The light can also be used to check for any stains or spots on the garments.

Hanger with Vibration Alert: A coat hanger with a built-in vibration alert that notifies users when it's time to take their garments out of the dryer or washing machine. The hanger can be placed near the laundry area and will vibrate when the garments are ready to be removed.

Hanger with Smart Organization System: A coat hanger with a smart organization system that uses sensors and AI to optimize the storage of garments in the closet. The hanger can detect the type of garment hanging on it and suggest the best location in the closet for it, based on factors such as color, fabric type, and seasonality.
